title: Vehicular Pursuit Policies (Pennington County Sheriff's Office)

communications.subject: South Dakota Open Records Law Request: Vehicular Pursuit Policies (Pennington County Sheriff's Office)
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the South Dakota Open Records Law, I hereby request the following records:

All current policies maintained by the department regarding vehicle pursuits (also known as: car chase, vehicular response policy, vehicular pursuit procedure).

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Sydnee Coggins-Prioleau

communications.subject: RE: South Dakota Open Records Law Request: Vehicular Pursuit Policies (Pennington County Sheriff's Office)
communications.communication:
Good Morning,

The Rapid City Police Department has received your request for information.

The Rapid City Police Department’s rules and procedures are posted on our website and can be found at Rules and Procedures (rcgov.org)<https://www.rcgov.org/index.php?option=com_docman&view=download&alias=28122-rcpd-rules-and-procedures-june-2023&category_slug=police-department&Itemid=149>.

Thank you.


[A close up of a sign  Description automatically generated]


Jennie Clabo | Technology and Records Manager
Rapid City Police Department

P : 605-394-4117 | C : 605-430-4117
Visit us online: RapidCity.Police.org<https://www.rcgov.org/departments/police-department.html>
We are hiring - Apply online at Rapid City Police Jobs<https://rapidcitypolicejobs.com/>

[A picture containing drawing  Description automatically generated]<https://www.facebook.com/RapidCityPD> [A picture containing drawing  Description automatically generated] <https://twitter.com/RapidCityPD> .[A close up of a sign  Description automatically generated]<https://www.youtube.com/user/RapidCityPD> [A picture containing drawing  Description automatically generated] <https://www.linkedin.com/company/rapid-city-police-department/>  [A picture containing mirror  Description automatically generated] <https://www.instagram.com/rapidcitypd/>

COMMUNITY – SERVICE – INTEGRITY
